title: Development of composite separators by coating hydrochloric acid-treated halloysite nanotubes on polypropylene separators for lithium-ion batteries
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16912-16920
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02164A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Qinting Deng, Xiuyun Chuan, Yupeng Zhao, Fangfang Liu, Shizhi Huang, Jianyang Wu
(1) HNTs treated with HCl of different concentrations were coated on both sides of PP separators to prepare PP/HNT composite separators. (2) The PP/HNT composite separators exhibited improved physical and electrochemical properties.
